name: ENIME
description:
Description:

#minijam - Darkness theme with restriction of "you are your own enemy".

Click on the devouring mouth to spread the darkness and earn a higher score the longer you go.  Just don't get yourself stuck in a corner or eaten by yourself!

Version 1.1:

The game is incomplete.  I wanted to add people running around to eat, and the other mouths that move around don't do much.  It's also a little buggy, but the core concept is there.  There's also no game over screen or way to restart.

Version 1.2:

Changed the graphics.  Attempted to get some procedural maps going, but they didn't really work for the gameplay I built, and I've lost interest in trying to make it work.

Notes:

I've only had 4 hours to make this over 3 days, so I'll try and get more done by the end of submission but it's pretty much done.  I started the Jam working on a different idea, but it was too complicated and went with something simpler.

OS Platforms:

  • Windows - works (through Wine)
  • Linux - works
  • MacOS - I have no way to test this
  • HTML - doesn't seem to work, I don't know why (it's zipped so unzip it)
